paragraphs.text:
%md

DSE Search in action
====================

>Warning: to use this demo, you'll need to have **Datastax Enterprise 4.7.1** at least

result.msg:
DSE Search in action

Warning: to use this demo, you'll need to have Datastax Enterprise 4.7.1 at least

paragraphs.title: Solr in action
paragraphs.text:
%cassandra

USE spark_demo;

SELECT year,performer,title 
FROM albums 
WHERE solr_query='performer:"*{{Artist Name=Jackson}}*" 
AND title:"{{Song Tile= }}" 
AND year:{{Release Year=1980}}';
